content:
Mitla Cafe is known for its delicious Mexican food and has several vegetarian options on the menu. Here are a few options you might want to try:

1. Bean and Cheese Burrito - This classic menu item is filled with seasoned beans and melted cheese. 2. Cheese Enchiladas - These vegetarian enchiladas are filled with cheese and topped with a flavorful red sauce. 3. Chile Relleno - This dish features a roasted, stuffed pepper filled with cheese and topped with a tomato sauce. 4. Veggie Quesadilla - This cheesy quesadilla is stuffed with sautéed veggies like bell peppers, onions, and mushrooms. 5. Tostada Salad - This salad features a crispy tostada shell topped with lettuce, beans, cheese, and fresh veggies. I hope this helps! Enjoy your meal at Mitla Cafe!
